user_input: Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. Use Methane as the complement not the carrier. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) for years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050 with node splitting enabled and Methane as the complement (not the carrier). Export results to TST format. Do not access any PLEXOS database; operate on external data files only.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Enable node splitting. Use Methane as the complement (not the carrier). No PLEXOS DB access.

tasks.description: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with node splitting enabled and Methane set as the complement (not the carrier).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Use the provided user_input to determine scenarios, years, node splitting, and complement configuration. No PLEXOS database interaction is required.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly demand profiles to TST format for the 'Hybrid Heat Pump' carrier.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Consume outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' and package them into TST workbooks according to TYNDP 2026 conventions. No PLEXOS database interaction is required.
